job_title: Data Scientist - AI and Data Science
job_purpose: Fortescue is seeking a Data Scientist specializing in AI and Data Science to drive innovation, develop AI models, and provide actionable insights that support strategic goals.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Analyze complex data sets to provide actionable insights and present findings
Develop, implement, optimize, monitor, and maintain AI models and solutions
Apply principles of AI and data ethics to ensure solutions are ethical, safe, and explainable
Monitor and apply emerging technology and open-source trends for data science projects
Conduct research to explore new methodologies, tools, and techniques for enhancing data science capabilities
Develop and maintain software solutions using best practices in programming and software development
Manage and maintain data management processes for data integrity, security, and accessibility
Gather and validate requirements for data science projects from stakeholders
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, mathematics, statistics, machine learning, or related field
5+ years of experience in data science and AI solution system development in mining, energy, green energy, or heavy industrial operations
Strong understanding and practical experience in Machine Learning and Generative AI
Proficiency in Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch
Experience with Snowflake, Kafka, S3, Databricks/SageMaker, AWS, Azure
Practical experience with software development industry best practices
company_details: Fortescue is at the forefront of using AI to transform the mining value chain. The company values innovation, collaboration, and leveraging deep technical capabilities to drive strategic advancements. Fortescue is committed to decarbonizing its operations and promoting an inclusive culture.
